1 # Lib
2 import rospy
3 import subprocess
4 from threading import Event, Thread, Lock
5 from queue import Queue, Empty
6 
7 # Messages
8 from std_msgs.msg import String
9 
10 # Services
11 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger
12 
13 # Command Status
14 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
15 
16 from .sound_volume import VolumeManager
17 
18 
19 class SoundExecution:
20 
21  def __init__(self, sound, start_time_sec=0, end_time_sec=0):
22  self.sound = sound
23  self.name = sound.name
24 
25  self.start_time_sec = start_time_sec
26  self.play_duration = 0 if (end_time_sec == 0 or
27  end_time_sec > sound.duration or
28  start_time_sec > end_time_sec) else end_time_sec - start_time_sec
29  self.__process = None
30 
31  self.__lock = Lock()
32  self.event = Event()
33  self.event.clear()
34 
35  self.result = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
36  self.message = "Sound {} not played".format(self.name)
37 
38  def wait(self):
39  play_time = rospy.Time.now()
40  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and not self.event.wait(0.25):
41  # self.__process.poll() is None ==> finished
42  try:
43  if self.__process is not None and not self.is_busy():
44  break
45  except AttributeError:
46  pass
47 
48  time_play = self.play_duration if self.play_duration > 0 else self.sound.duration
49  if (rospy.Time.now() - play_time).to_sec() > time_play * 2 + 2:
50  print(time_play, max(time_play * 2, 2), (rospy.Time.now() - play_time).to_sec())
51  self.message = "Sound {} timeout".format(self.name)
52  self.result = CommandStatus.SOUND_TIMEOUT
53  return self.result, self.message
54 
55  if self.result != CommandStatus.PREEMPTED:
56  self.message = "Sound {} played".format(self.name)
57  self.result = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
58 
59  return self.result, self.message
60 
61  # - Main class usage
62  def play(self, volume):
63  with self.__lock:
64  if self.event.is_set():
65  return self
66 
67  try:
68  sound_path = self.sound.path
69  except AttributeError:
70  self.result = CommandStatus.FAILURE
71  self.message = "Path attribute error on sound {}".format(self.name)
72  self.event.set()
73  return self
74 
75  if self.play_duration > 0:
76  args = (
77  "ffplay", "-nodisp", "-loglevel", "quiet", "-autoexit", "-volume", str(volume), "-ss",
78  str(self.start_time_sec), "-t", str(self.play_duration), sound_path)
79  else:
80  args = (
81  "ffplay", "-nodisp", "-loglevel", "quiet", "-autoexit", "-volume", str(volume), "-ss",
82  str(self.start_time_sec), sound_path)
83  # os.system('ffplay -nodisp -autoexit -volume {} -ss {} {}'.format(volume, start_sec, self.__path))
84 
85  try:
86  self.__process = subprocess.Popen(args, stdout=subprocess.DEVNULL, stderr=subprocess.DEVNULL)
87  except OSError:
88  self.result = CommandStatus.FAILURE
89  self.message = 'Please install ffmpeg with "sudo apt install ffmpeg" to use the sound interface.'
90  rospy.logerr(self.message)
91  self.event.set()
92  return self
93  return self
94 
95  def stop(self):
96  with self.__lock:
97  self.result = CommandStatus.PREEMPTED
98  self.message = "Sound {} stopped".format(self.name)
99 
100  if self.__process is not None:
101  try:
102  self.__process.kill() # .terminate()
103  except OSError:
104  pass
105 
106  self.event.set()
107 
108  def is_busy(self):
109  try:
110  return self.__process.poll() is None
111  except AttributeError:
112  return False
113 
114 
115 class SoundPlayer:
116  """
117  Object which configure the sound management on the robot
118  """
119 
120  def __init__(self):
121  # - Init
122  self.__volume_manager = VolumeManager()
123 
124  self.__playing_instance = None
125  self.__execution_queue = Queue()
126  self.__lock = Lock()
127 
128  self.loop_state = False
129  self.__loop = Thread(target=self.playing_loop)
130 
131  # - Publisher
132  self.__sound_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot_sound/sound', String, latch=True, queue_size=10)
133  self.__sound_publisher.publish("")
134 
135  # - Services
136  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_sound/stop', Trigger, self.__callback_stop)
137 
138  rospy.on_shutdown(self.stop_loop)
139  self.__loop.start()
140  rospy.loginfo("Sound loop started")
141 
142  def __call__(self, *args, **kwargs):
143  if len(args) < 3:
144  return
145 
146  sound, start_time_sec, end_time_sec = args[:3]
147  sound_execution = SoundExecution(sound, start_time_sec, end_time_sec)
148 
149  self.__execution_queue.put(sound_execution)
150  self.stop_current()
151 
152  return sound_execution
153 
154  def __del__(self):
155  self.stop_loop()
156 
157  def stop_loop(self):
158  self.loop_state = False
159  self.stop_all()
160 
161  def playing_loop(self):
162  self.loop_state = True
163  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self.loop_state:
164  try:
165  sound_execution = self.__execution_queue.get(timeout=1)
166  except Empty:
167  continue
168 
169  self.__sound_publisher.publish(sound_execution.name)
170  self.__playing_instance = sound_execution.play(volume=self.__volume_manager.volume)
171 
172  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self.__playing_instance.is_busy():
173  rospy.sleep(0.1)
174  if not self.__execution_queue.empty():
175  sound_execution.stop()
176 
177  self.__sound_publisher.publish("")
178 
179  sound_execution.event.set()
180  self.__execution_queue.task_done()
181 
182  def overlay_sound(self, sound):
183  return SoundExecution(sound).play(volume=self.__volume_manager.volume)
184 
185  # - Callbacks
186  def __callback_stop(self, _msg):
187  if self.__playing_instance is None or not self.__playing_instance.is_busy():
188  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "No sound to be stopped"
189 
190  sound_name = self.stop_all()
191  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "{} sound stopped".format(sound_name)
192 
193  def stop_current(self, fade_out=False):
194 
195  if self.__playing_instance:
196  if fade_out:
197  old_volume = self.__volume_manager.raw_volume
198  self.__volume_manager.fade_out()
199  self.__playing_instance.stop()
200  self.__volume_manager.set_volume(old_volume)
201  else:
202  self.__playing_instance.stop()
203 
204  def stop_all(self):
205  last_sound_name = self.__playing_instance.name if self.__playing_instance else ""
206  while not self.__execution_queue.empty():
207  sound_execution = self.__execution_queue.get()
208  sound_execution.stop()
209  self.__execution_queue.task_done()
210  last_sound_name = sound_execution.name
211  self.stop_current()
212  return last_sound_name
